text: Bernay-Neuvy-en-Champagne is a commune. It is found in the Pays de la Loire region in the Sarthe department in the west of France. The municipality was created on 1 January 2019 and consists of the former communes of Neuvy-en- Champagne (the seat) and Bernay-en-Champagne.Arrêté préfectoral 26 September 2018 == References == Category:2019 establishments in France Category:Communes in Sarthe
title: Bernay-Neuvy-en-Champagne
